title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly define the scope of the Planetary Waste Heat Radiator system, including requirements for heat collection, radiation into space, and energy efficiency.

title: Design Conceptual Architecture
description: Create a high-level design of the system architecture, including components for heat collection, radiator design, and energy management.

title: Design Frontend Interface
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface, including any necessary visualizations of temperature and energy usage.

title: Design Backend Infrastructure
description: Create a backend design for data collection, processing, and communication between components.

title: Develop Heat Collection Component Designs
description: Create detailed designs for the heat collection components, including materials, size, and energy efficiency.

title: Develop Radiator Designs
description: Create detailed designs for the radiator components, including materials, size, and radiation efficiency.

title: Develop Energy Management System Designs
description: Create detailed designs for the energy management system, including power distribution and control mechanisms.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Write detailed documentation for the system design, including component diagrams and operational procedures.

title: Implement Unit Tests for Frontend Components
description: Write and implement unit tests for the frontend components to ensure they function as expected.

title: Implement Unit Tests for Backend Components
description: Write and implement unit tests for the backend components to ensure they function as expected.
